value.headline: Frontend developer | Angular, React, VueJS, GraphQL and willing to learn more. Let us create something beautiful.
value.label: Senior Frontend/Javascript Engineer
value.name: Ryan Castañeda
value.summary:
I am a frontend developer based on the Philippines,  which is an advantage as I may have lesser annual rates and can work on AU and NZ time zones, that helps companies offer long term solutions,  attract visitors and help them signup as well as increase site retention via faster load speed without compromising client-approved design. Well-versed in doing frontend related work even in a high-pressured environment, always looking for ways to improve my craft in every time my code editor is open. 

As a Frontend developer for a long time with over 9 years of professional experience optimizing page speed, creating efficient reusable code building either on React or Vue as well as consuming APIs. I am quite confident that I would be a valuable asset to the team.

node.name: Renew Technologies
highlights: Made improvements/features on UI modules to the canopy site portal for the client Banyan Technologies.
Main frontend developer for client called 3CI - MAU, worked on revamping their legacy site to a modern angular site that is at least 3 times faster in terms of load speed.
Created test cases to each features to ensure confidence when deploying to production.

Mainly developed RBL site, The RBL Group,  an organization that  develops custom leadership, HR and organization solutions that increase stakeholder confidence and create extraordinary value using several surveying technologies.
Created features for OneRail one of America's fastest growing private companies, created code that is being used for around 40k deliveries  on a daily basis.
node.summary: Part of the team that are entrusted to specific clients of the organization.

node.name: DSS Asia - Atlantis Health Client
highlights: Created https://actionadopt.fr/ from ground up, using a spreadsheet as a source for its translation feature.
Created antengene site, for their patient support program called XACCESS program
Fix bugs on smartsight, MSDEquip, XSetGO, and keycare websites
node.summary: Frontend Developer for Atlantis Healthgroup that handles various medical organizations such as Antengene, Smartsight,  Bayer, ALK France, Santen, Whitelabel Prject

node.name: Acquire Asia Pacific - LKG Group and NBL
node.company: Acquire Asia Pacific - LKG Group and NBL
highlights: Also handled Shopify clients that had their design ready but still requires some development work.  All projects had a successful launch after the developer turnover.
Created a new donation landing page for Stroke Foundation a known national charity organization in Australia, had an increase of 20% in total of donations.
Created the landing page for Armaguard, a leading currency management provider in the whole nation. Made their site easily editable, loads blazingly fast without compromising design
Made landing pages for some properties of Amity Property Group, which lead them to more leads upon launch.
Made improvements to Newsmodo and Frankly clients, fixing stretched images and promoted suggestions on how to improve their page load
node.summary: Part of the frontend team that handled NBL which is Australia’s version of the NBA, in which we successfully delivered 1 month ahead of deadline. Page speed improved by about 5 secs of load time and had a 60% increase of site engagement.

node.name: Zigzag Media - Plantminer
highlights: Setup end to end testing framework in replacement for CasperJS using webdriverIO, phantomJS, Selenium
Built reusable and system critical components using ReactJS and Redux
Provided training about ReactJS, Selenium and modern Javascript technologies
Led the frontend development team for two years, providing effective cross-site modules that require a strict deadline
node.summary: Became part of the team that developed Plantminer Website, helped improve page load times and client site retention. PlantMiner.com.au was launched in May 2013 and is now Australia’s largest plant and equipment hire marketplace with over 400,000 items for hire from over 2,500 supplies Australia wide. It is a free online tool for those looking to hire plant and equipment. During my time on PlantMiner (www.plantminer.com.au) joins the Technology Fast 500 Asia Pacific 2016 Rank 88 with 598% fiscal year revenue growth!

node.name: Freedom MCN
highlights: Started as a full-stack developer, but later on focused on front-end as the company gathered more people and team.
Had the chance to became a team lead which helped the team by assigning tasks and checking codes before deployments.
Helped the company and the CEO itself for application ideas, implementations and technology stack to be used(especially front-end).
Implemented most of AngularJS standard conventions of frontend development.
Created multiple boilerplate that the company used for front-end developments.
As a pioneer developer of the company, I helped the company in every way possible which includes non-dev works.
node.summary: Became part of the team that developed Freedom! Dashboard, which is the main product of the company, it is the fastest growing MCN in history of YouTube. Has around a million user accounts created since it’s been live. Created multiple modules like the earnings module of the app which includes the accounting. Contributed to most admin functions of the dashboard like accepting applications, setting partner revenue share, and similar administrative services, also created the sponsorship module. Written in Laravel PHP and AngularJS running on AWS environment with MySQL as database. Worked on most frontend tasks with AngularJS and Javascript.

node.name: Openovate Labs
node.summary: Helped build web apps for multiple clients, the tasks includes slicing design prototypes for creating image sprites for the app and testing.
